00022 /// @file   MidasEngine.h
00023 /// @brief  Headers for MidasEngine.
00024 ///         Iterator which reads input data files, calls
00025 ///         the MidasSpliceDetector for each probeset_id (gene) and
00026 ///         probeset_list_id (exon) data pair, writes output to file.
00027 
00028 #ifndef MIDASENGINE_H
00029 #define MIDASENGINE_H
00030 
00031 //
00032 #include "midas/MidasSpliceDetector.h"
00033 //
00034 #include "file/TsvFile/TsvFile.h"
00035 #include "util/PgOptions.h"
00036 //
00037 #include <cstring>
00038 #include <map>
00039 #include <stdexcept>
00040 #include <string>
00041 #include <vector>
00042 //
00043 
00044 // hard coded column names
00045 #define PROBESET_ID "probeset_id"
00046 #define PROBESET_LIST "probeset_list"
00047 #define PROBESET_LIST_ID "probeset_list_id"
00048 
00049 /// @brief define the midas options.
00050 void define_midas_opts(PgOptions* opts);
00051 
00052 /**
00053  *  midasEngine
00054  *  \brief Object for midas engine.
00055  *
00056  */
00057 class midasEngine
00058 {
00059 public:
00060   /** Constructor.
00061    * @param celFiles List of cel_file names.
00062    * @param groups List of group indices.
00063    * @param metaFileName Meta probeset file name.
00064    * @param geneDataFileName Gene data file name.
00065    * @param exonDataFileName Exon data file name.
00066    * @param pvaluesFileName Output file name for p values.
00067    * @param fstatsFileName Output file name for F statistics.
00068    * @param normalizedFileName Output file name for normalized exon signal.
00069    * @param wantPvalues Caller requests p values.
00070    * @param wantFstats Caller requests F statistics.
00071    * @param wantNormalized Caller requests normalized exon signals.
00072    * @param logStabilize Amount to add to data before taking logarithm.
00073    * @param noLogTransform Do not log transform data.
00074    */
00075 
00076   /* Note: the parameters wantPvalues, wantFstats, wantNormalized, and noLogTransform,
00077      user configurable options, are functionally either true or false and could be
00078      treated as bools.  Here they are defined as ints so that this code could be
00079      swig wrapped; in Visual Studio builds of swig wrapped code, using bools for these
00080      parameters produced unresolved external symbol errors at link time. */
00081 
00082   midasEngine (const std::vector<std::string>& celFiles, const std::vector<int>& groups,
00083       std::string metaFileName, std::string geneDataFileName, std::string exonDataFileName,
00084       std::string pvaluesFileName, std::string fstatsFileName, std::string normalizedFileName,
00085       int wantPvalues, int wantFstats, int wantNormalized, const float& logStabilize,
00086       int noLogTransform);
00087 
00088   /** Destructor.
00089    */
00090   ~midasEngine ();
00091 
00092   /** Read, process data, write output.
00093    */
00094   void analyze();
00095 
00096   // a place to park metatags
00097   affx::TsvFile metatagBucketTsv;
00098 
00099 private:
00100 
00101   /** Open output file to append
00102    * @param fileName File name.
00103    * @param Ofstream Ofstream.
00104    */
00105   //void openOutputAppend (const char* fileName, ofstream& Ofstream);
00106   void openOutput_Pvalues(std::string filename);

00154   const int wantPvalues;
00155   /// caller requests F statistics
00156   const int wantFstats;

00159   /// Amount to add to data before taking logarithm

00161   /// caller requests no log transform of data

00163   /// SpliceDetector object
00164   midasSpliceDetector spliceDetector;

00167   /// map from probeset_list id to vector of probeset ids

00169   /// map from gene id to row number

00173   /// fstream for output
